fields.description: Failover policy of the read-write endpoint for the failover group. If failoverPolicy is Automatic then failoverWithDataLossGracePeriodMinutes is required.
fields.name: FailoverPolicy

fields.description: Grace period before failover with data loss is attempted for the read-write endpoint. If failoverPolicy is Automatic then failoverWithDataLossGracePeriodMinutes is required.
fields.name: FailoverWithDataLossGracePeriodMinutes
